resources.string: Choose where the house is located.\n Questions can be repeated until you score 10 points\n If you make a mistake once, points are not deducted, but you must answer twice after that, so that the point is awarded
"Successfully!\n"

Choose which house have this coat of arms.\n Questions can be repeated until you score 10 points\n If you make a mistake once, points are not deducted, but you must answer twice after that, so that the point is awarded
"Victory!\n"

Answer is whether character is in the Aryas list.\n Questions can be repeated until you score 10 points\n If you make a mistake once, points are not deducted, but you must answer twice after that, so that the point is awarded
"Good job!\n"

Choose which actor played the character.\n Questions can be repeated until you score 10 points\n If you make a mistake once, points are not deducted, but you must answer twice after that, so that the point is awarded
"Nice!\n"

Choose what year the book was written in.\n Questions can be repeated until you score 10 points\n If you make a mistake once, points are not deducted, but you must answer twice after that, so that the point is awarded
"Not bad!\n"

Choose if the character is alive or dead.\n Questions can be repeated until you score 10 points\n If you make a mistake once, points are not deducted, but you must answer twice after that, so that the point is awarded
"Good work!\n"

Choose the motto of the house.\n Questions can be repeated until you score 10 points\n If you make a mistake once, points are not deducted, but you must answer twice after that, so that the point is awarded
"Well played!\n"

Choose who murdered the character.\n Questions can be repeated until you score 10 points\n If you make a mistake once, points are not deducted, but you must answer twice after that, so that the point is awarded
"Nice work!\n"

Choose whose sword it is.\n Questions can be repeated until you score 10 points\n If you make a mistake once, points are not deducted, but you must answer twice after that, so that the point is awarded
"Good for you!\n"

Choose region where is the city located.\n Questions can be repeated until you score 10 points\n If you make a mistake once, points are not deducted, but you must answer twice after that, so that the point is awarded
"Well done!\n"
